snippet: Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, who once led the Yukos oil company, vows to lead a drive to counter Putinism but has not yet dared to return to Russia.
abstract: Former Russian oil tycoon Mikhail B Khodorkovsky vows to lead a drive to counter Pres Vladimir V Putin but has not yet dared to return to Russia; visit by country's most famous dissident to Washington signals re-emergence after period of staying out of sight; he spent decade in prison camps.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, who once led the Yukos oil company, vows to lead a drive to counter Putinism but has not yet dared to return to Russia.

headline.seo: Mikhail Khodorkovsky, Ex-Oil Tycoon, Plans to Lead Political Movement
headline.main: Russian Dissident Opens New Chapter in His Anti-Putin Movement
headline.print_headline: Russian Dissident Opens New Chapter in His Anti-Putin Movement
